main.name: Benjamin Tang
main.description: Computer Science, Business, Robotics @ Cornell. Class of 2025
main.bio: Quick learner seeking to gain experience in software development and robotics with proven skills in Java and collaboration. Eager to discover new insights by synthesizing technology, business, and art. Named as a Meinig Scholar, awarded to 1.3% of Cornell undergrads for leadership and academic excellence.
